::Spears::

She srugged her shoulders. "Yeah, I know.  I pulled out a spear for 
nothing.  Oh well, no one got hurt, save the bird. And we still got 
our ship." She said with a smile.  She turned and looked at the Ark,
"Well, what's left of it anyways."

She looked at Striker, "How soon until Ramulus gets here? THe sooner 
he arrives, the sooner we can get the plans into action."

She walked to the entrance and went inside the ark.
She was starting to get mad at herself.  Another hostage situation, 
and she once again had to back down from a pred.  This was getting to 
her.  She had her spear in her hand and stuck into the wall in the 
hallway.  She left it there and walked to her quarters.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod sees that the battle is over. He walks up to Spears.
> "Damn! I was all reved up for nothing."
